verbose_text: In addition, HSP 70 has been reported to block several steps of the apoptotic cascade such as upstream from mitochondria, release of cytochrome c and apoptosis inducing factor (AIF), nuclear import of AIF, activation of procaspase-9 and -3, and even downstream of active caspase-3.
evidence: HSP 70 has been reported to block several steps of the apoptotic cascade such as upstream from mitochondria, release of cytochrome c and apoptosis
